synopsis.text:
While navigating the ordinary trials of high school life in Sendai, Dai Miyamoto, a third-year student and basketball player, stumbles upon an extraordinary passion for jazz music. After attending a live jazz performance with a friend, he becomes captivated by the soulful melodies and resolves to master the tenor saxophone, aspiring to become the world's greatest jazz musician. Day in and day out, under the warm sun and pouring rain, Dai diligently practices, driven by an unwavering determination and a deep love for the music.

Despite facing initial criticism from unimpressed listeners during his first performance, Dai remains undeterred. He wholeheartedly believes that his journey to greatness relies not only on natural talent and hard work but also on the unyielding stubbornness to never give up. Leaving behind the familiarity of his hometown, Dai embarks on a new adventure to the bustling nightclubs of Tokyo, eager to form a professional band and share his music with the world. Can Dai's unwavering dedication and the jazz in his heart inspire others and pave the way to a successful career?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
